description: Numbers with exactly 2 palindromic prime factors (counted with multiplicity), and no other prime factors.
comments: Intersection of A001358 and A033620; A046368 is a subsequence. [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 10 2011]Equivalently, semiprimes where both prime factors are palindromes - Franklin T. Adams-Watters, Apr 11 2011.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: palQ[n_] := Reverse[x = IntegerDigits[n]] == x; Select[Range[1800], PrimeOmega[#] == 2 && And @@ palQ /@ First /@ FactorInteger[#] &] (*_Jayanta Basu_, Jun 23 2013 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Jun 15 1998.
extensions: Definition clarified by _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Apr 11 2011
